title: BASQUEVOLT, the Basque initiative for the production of solid-state batteries, is launched with the aim of producing 10GWh by 2027
notes:
Location:
- The BASQUEVOLT solid-state battery initiative is located in the Basque Country, specifically in the Álava Technology Park, in the Marie Curie Building (c/ Albert Einstein, no. 35).

Capacity:
- The project aims to reach a capacity of 10GWh for battery cell production by 2027.

Investment amounts:
- An investment of more than 700 million euros is planned to support the launch of the first production line, which is expected to generate more than 800 direct jobs.

Project progress:
- The project plans to launch the first production line within 4 years, with the commissioning of a pilot production line in 2025 and actual production starting in 2027.

Project type:
- The project is a new build, focused on the development of solid-state batteries.

Value chain stages:
- The facility will cover the stages of cathode and anode manufacturing, cell fabrication, and module assembly.

title: Iberdrola takes a stake in Basquevolt, the solid-state battery company
notes:
Location:
- The Basquevolt solid-state battery initiative is located in the Basque Country, which is in northern Spain.

Capacity:
- The project aims to reach a capacity of 10GWh for battery cells by 2027.

Investment amounts:
- The investment for the project is more than 700 million euros, with Iberdrola making this investment through its international start-up programme PERSEO.

Project progress:
- The project is set to start the first production line within 4 years, with the aim of generating more than 800 direct jobs. The initial targets include the development of prototype cells and a pilot production line in 2025, with the ambition to start production in 2027.

Project type:
- The project is a new build, as it is starting from scratch with the aim of becoming the European leader in solid-state batteries.

Value chain stages:
- The project aims to cover the stages of cathode and anode manufacturing, cell fabrication, and module assembly to enable the mass deployment of electric transport, stationary energy storage, and advanced portable devices.

title: Basquevolt, the Basque initiative to make solid-state batteries
notes:
Location:
- The Basquevolt project is located in the Basque Autonomous Community in the Basque Country, Europe.

Capacity:
- The planned production capacity of the Basquevolt project is 10 GWh per year, with a pilot production line expected to be commissioned in 2025 and full production to start in 2027.

Investment amounts:
- The project expects an investment of €700 million, with the consortium of founding investors led by the Basque Government and including Iberdrola, CIE Automotive, Enagás, EIT InnoEnergy, and CIC energiGUNE.

Project progress:
- The project started in secret two years ago and aims to set up a production line for solid-state batteries by 2027. It plans to develop prototype cells and commission a pilot production line in 2025.

Project type:
- The Basquevolt project is a new build, aiming to become Europe's first solid-state battery gigafactory.

Value chain stages:
- The facility will cover the stages of cathode and anode manufacturing, cell fabrication, and module assembly, with a focus on developing technologies for solid-state batteries.

Note: The information provided covers the key aspects of the Basquevolt project based on the articles provided.

title: Telefónica and Siemens digitalise Basquevolt´s solid-state battery cell prototyping plant
notes:
Location:
Vitoria-Gasteiz, Spain

Capacity:
N/A

Investment amounts:
N/A

Project progress:
The project is in the prototyping phase, with the first results expected in the first four months of 2024. Telefónica and Siemens are providing digitalization processes and connectivity to Basquevolt's new battery prototype plant. The project aims to set up a prototyping line integrating various digitalization processes for the production of solid-state lithium batteries.

Project type:
New build - setting up a prototyping line for the production of solid-state lithium batteries.

Value chain stages:
1) Cathode and anode manufacturing
2) Cell fabrication
3) Module assembly

title: Basquevolt wants to start producing solid-state batteries by 2025
notes:
Location:
- The Basquevolt initiative is located in the Álava Technology Park in Spain.

Capacity:
- The plan is to achieve an annual production volume of 10 GWh in 2027.

Investment amounts:
- The project has investments of 700 million euros.

Project progress:
- The Basquevolt initiative aims to develop prototype cells and commission a pilot production line in 2025, with the goal of achieving an annual production volume of 10 GWh in 2027.

Project type:
- The project involves the research, development, and production of solid-state batteries.

Value chain stages:
- The initiative covers the stages of research, development, and production of solid-state batteries, including prototype cell development and pilot production line commissioning.

title: BASQUEVOLT, the Basque initiative for the production of solid-state batteries, is launched with the aim of producing 10GWh by 2027
notes:
Location:
- The BASQUEVOLT battery production project is located in the Álava Technology Park, specifically in the Marie Curie Building (c/ Albert Einstein, no. 35), in the Basque Country, Spain.

Capacity:
- The project aims to reach a capacity of 10GWh for battery cell production, with the first production line planned to be launched in 4 years.

Investment amounts:
- The initiative involves an investment of more than 700 million euros.

Project progress:
- The project is in the initial phase, with plans to develop prototype cells and commission a pilot production line in 2025, and start production in 2027.

Project type:

Value chain stages:
- The facility will cover the stages of cathode and anode manufacturing, cell fabrication, and module assembly.
